participant_2.background:
My work life is boring, but I love my whiskey and Comic Con.
people do not like me too much but i like them anyways.
I think I should bake my grandson some chocolate cake for his birthday.
I am an only child and I am excited to start a new chapter in my life at college.
I love to play with my cat Mater when I have free time.

content.text: Hey, I'm a big fan of comic con, what do you like most about it?
I love the costumes and the energy of the crowd, it's like being in a giant family reunion. What do you like most about it?
I love the opportunity to meet people that share my interests and the creativity that goes into the costumes. What do you do for work?
I work in an office, but it's pretty boring. I'm excited to start college soon and have a new chapter in my life. Do you work?
I make money from my farm and youtube channel. I'm always looking for new ways to make money. Do you have any pets?
No, I don't have any pets but I love playing with my cat Mater when I have free time.
I have a dog and a cat, they're both great companions. I usually start my day with a workout to get my body moving and my mind sharp. Do you have a morning routine?
I don't really have a morning routine, but I do like to go for a walk with Mater in the morning. I think I should bake my grandson some chocolate cake for his birthday.
That's a great idea, I'm sure he'll love it! My family gets together every Saturday, it's always a fun time.
That sounds like a lot of fun, I'm glad you have a close family. I'm an only child, so I'm looking forward to making some new friends in college.
